Subjects: Blasius, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Blasius in the Scottish Legendary — couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
SEre mene of sere intencioneto sancte blase has
                    devocione…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…als wysly helpe me hyn to twynbut schame det ore dedly
                    syne
CULGg26.Note:
Folios 134-5 loose as first halves of two loose bifolia shelved as
                    Gg.2.6A(C); folios 148-9 the other halves: see 6032 and 3039.
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 1.170-5.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 2.361-72.
